rows.label: tlk70000141_04_msg0001
rows.name:
The coming battle with the
Holy Grail... It will exact
a heavy toll on all of us.

rows.label: tlk70000141_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Adel, if the worst happens,
you can entrust the safety
of Aletta to me.

rows.label: tlk70000141_04_msg0003
rows.name:
But I pray that you
all return unharmed.

rows.label: tlk70000141_04_msg0005
rows.name: Are you asking me to go with you?

rows.label: tlk70000141_04_msg0006
rows.name: My apologies. I wish I could.

rows.label: tlk70000141_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Perhaps in my younger days, but
with eight centuries behind me, I
am nought but a feeble old man.

rows.label: tlk70000141_04_msg0009
rows.name:
Well, I, er, that is to say...
This is a different matter
to the one previously.
